RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 69. Maiden Claiming Purse 13800. FOR MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MODUS stalked the early pace, rallied on the far turn and gained the lead, drew off in the stretch while racing a bit erratic. GOLDEN CHELLA set the pace for five eights, was no match for the winner late. AWESOME BREAK showed little and trailed.

ENTRY.COMMENT: showed little, trailed,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 82. Claiming Purse 11100. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE MARCH 15. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 15 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HIDDEN RULER had good position early, rallied at the quarter pole three wide, closed determinedly and was up in the final strides. YO BERBS was well placed early and saved ground, rallied on the rail and opened a clear lead in the stretch, held well and was caught late. CALL WEST was allowed to settle early swung five wide in the stretch and finished well . QIAN B C settled early and trailed, rallied in the stretch and closed willingly. READY TO MARCH set the pace with a clear lead, weakened in the stretch and was bumped late. AREYOUTALKINGTOME allowed to settle, failed to menace. W W KAN DO contended for a half, then weakened. The stewards posted the inquiry sign but took no action.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 59. Claiming Purse 19500. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 15 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LADY FORTUNE had good position early, rallied on the rail drew clear in mid stretch, lasted late under firm handling. CAN I GO TOO was unhurried early, rallied in the stretch on the inside, altered course mid stretch and finished well to just miss. LARSA dueled on the lead while between horses and weakened late. EASTER PRIDE tracked four wide, rallied in the stretch and drew close, then hung late. MY PINK BABY BIRD vied for the lead and weakened in mid stretch. MILWAUKEE CAT allowed to settle, failed to menace. WAR MOON set pressured pace and faltered in mid stretch.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 74. Allowance Purse 27500. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 15 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowanc es).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DUNVEGAN DOLL was unhurried early and saved ground, angled out in the stretch, closed stoutly and drew clear late under firm handling. AWESOMELY SHY dueled early, shook clear on the turn, remained clear late and was caught near the wire. NO CHALK pressed four wide throughout and finished willingly. ADMAA raced wide and went evenly late. MIND YOUR OWN well placed early, lacked a late response. SILVER STICK STAIR dueled on the lead for a half and tired in the lane.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 90. Claiming Purse 17700. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE NOVEMBER 15. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 15 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SPICE IT UP had good position on the inside, angled out in the stretch and drew off late under strong handling. AFERDITA raced five wide, rallied in the stretch and closed fast to be up for place. BAREBACK FUN dueled early, shook clear on the turn, was hooked in mid stretch and weakened slightly late. SWEET QUEEN BEE settled early, rallied on the rail and drew close, hung late. FLOWZANO raced wide and needed more late. SASSY JUSTICE allowed to settle, saved ground and was no threat. CEVICHE dueled early and weakened. DIVINE MARTHA vied three wide for a half, then tired.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 89. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 27500. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR OHIO BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR ENTERED TO BE CLAIMED FOR $25,000. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-wi nners Of A Race Since February 15 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HAPPY BEE had good position early, rallied in the stretch four wide and drew clear late under firm handling. MALICED was carried out in the first turn, raced four wide down the backside, gained a slight lead in mid stretch and was caught late. POWER BANKER bore out in the first turn taking the field wide, dueled on the until late stretch and weakened slightly. R THREE ANGELS dueled on the lead throughout and held well in the stretch. CONTENT was carried out in the first turn, dropped to the rail down the backside and lacked a late bid. SPECIAL BEACH dueled on the lead until the far turn, then weakened. GLACKEN'S CAUSE was carried out in the first turn and trailed.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 83. Allowance Purse 25900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 15 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NICHOLAS JAMES raced mid pack early, rallied four wide in the stretch, closed determinedly and was up in the final stride. CONSIDER ME dueled on the lead throughout, held grudgingly after a long battle and just missed. SCRATCHOFF set the early pace, dueled on the lead throughout and held gamely late. SUPER BROTHER saved ground early, angled out three wide in the stretch and finished well to be gaining ABKER pressed the early pace and faltered in the lane. PRETTY LOUD was outrun. FISHING FOR FUN contended early and was through after a half. BARELYSTILLCOUNTS was no factor.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 8 1M Dirt CR: 72. Allowance Purse 35100. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 15 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less NotConsider ed In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SONNET was away alertly and quickly made the lead, set moderate fractions with a clear lead, was passed in mid stretch, came again late and edged clear. MOBIL CHIC pressed the pace three wide, rallied in the stretch three wide and gained a slight lead, was outfinshed late but was second best. LUCKY PENNY ROSE was unhurried early, rallied four wide in the stretch and improved late. RUNLIKEJACKIEO had good position on the inside and went evenly late. CROSSED UP contended for three quarters, then lacked a late bid. DANZA MAGIC chased the winner and tired in the stretch. STATE OF GRACE raced inside and was outrun.

ENTRY.COMMENT: was away alertly and quickly made the lead, set moderate fraction
